      Methods in org.linqs.psl.model.rule with parameters of type GroundRuleStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Rule.groundAll(AtomManager atomManager, GroundRuleStore grs)
      Adds all missing, potentially unsatisfied GroundRules to a GroundRuleStore based on an AtomManager.
      protected abstract void AbstractRule.notifyAtomEvent(AtomEvent event, GroundRuleStore grs)
      Handles an AtomEvent using the specified GroundRuleStore.
      void Rule.registerForAtomEvents(AtomEventFramework eventFramework, GroundRuleStore grs)
      Registers this Rule to listen for the AtomEvents it needs to update a GroundRuleStore.
      void AbstractRule.registerForAtomEvents(AtomEventFramework eventFramework, GroundRuleStore grs) 
      void Rule.unregisterForAtomEvents(AtomEventFramework eventFramework, GroundRuleStore grs)
      Stops updating a GroundRuleStore in response to AtomEvents from an AtomEventFramework and unregisters with that AtomEventFramework if it no longer needs to listen for AtomEvents from it.
      void AbstractRule.unregisterForAtomEvents(AtomEventFramework eventFramework, GroundRuleStore grs)

    • Uses of GroundRuleStore in org.linqs.psl.reasoner

      Subinterfaces of GroundRuleStore in org.linqs.psl.reasoner 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Reasoner
      A GroundKernelStore that can minimize the total weighted incompatibility of its GroundCompatibilityKernels such that the infeasibility of its GroundConstraintKernels is (close to) zero by optimizing the RandomVariableAtoms.
      Classes in org.linqs.psl.reasoner that implement GroundRuleStore 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExecutableReasoner
      An abstract superclass for reasoners implemented as command-line executables.

    • Uses of GroundRuleStore in org.linqs.psl.reasoner.bool

      Classes in org.linqs.psl.reasoner.bool that implement GroundRuleStore 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BooleanMaxWalkSat
      Implementation of MaxWalkSat, which searches for a good Boolean assignment of truth values.
      class  BooleanMCSat
      Implementation of MC-Sat, which approximates the marginal probability that each atom has value 1 in a Boolean domain.
